name: Little Hero Kokoro
description:
Rotate, puzzle, and explore your way through a land of mystery and wonder.

The little wooden boy Kokoro finds himself in a strange land, where the islands can be rotated. Solve puzzles, rotate the lands, find your way through the mazes, and find upgrades, items, and collectibles.

Uncover the mystery of the Eternal Door and what lies beyond.

Little Hero Kokoro can be played with keyboard and gamepad.

==============================================================

Hi, I'm Pascal, and have been working hard on an indie puzzle-adventure game. The demo below covers the first 30-40 minutes of gameplay of the first area in the game.

Thanks so much for checking out the game, please try out the demo below!

Please feel free to let me know what you think, or leave feedback and criticisms so the game can become the best it can be!
